directions: Stir together cucumber, tomatoes, onion, and yogurt. Heat oil in a small heavy skillet over moderate heat until hot but not smoking, then cook mustard seeds, cumin, and urad dal, stirring, until mustard seeds begin to pop. Pour oil mixture over vegetables and stir until combined. Stir in cilantro and salt to taste.
ingredients: 1 English cucumber, peeled, seeded, and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
2 plum tomatoes, seeded and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 teaspoon picked-over split skinned urad dal*
title: Cucumber, Tomato, and Onion Yogurt Salad
